title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XLI, pt. 2500 - Implementation State Environmental Quality Review Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XLI, pt. 2500 - Implementation State Environmental Quality Review Act

State Regulations
§ 2500.1 - Authority, purpose and policy
§ 2500.2 - Definitions
§ 2500.3 - Applicability
§ 2500.4 - General rule
§ 2500.5 - Responsibilities of applicants
§ 2500.6 - Procedures prior to the preparation of draft EIS's; actions involving other agencies
§ 2500.7 - Notices of completion of draft EIS's and circulation, filing and availability thereof; circulation, filing and availability of draft EIS's; public hearings and notices thereof
§ 2500.8 - Final EIS procedures
§ 2500.9 - Actions involving Federal participation
§ 2500.10 - Public hearings
§ 2500.11 - Content of environmental impact statements
§ 2500.12 - Agency decision making
§ 2500.13 - Filing of SEQR documents
§ 2500.14 - Fees and costs
§ 2500.15 - Criteria for determining what actions may have a significant effect on the environment
§ 2500.16 - Lists of actions
§ 2500.17 - Effective date

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XLI, pt. 2500

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §8-0113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
